high_descs: Move to the right side of the large wooden desk facing the box under the desk
Pick up the box under the desk top on the floor
Carry the box to the right facing the lamp on the right of the desk
anns.task_desc: Carry a box while turning on a lamp

high_descs: Walk forward to the small black night stand then turn left and walk to the chess board on the table in front of you.
Pick up the box that's on the floor in front of you.
Take a step to your right.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a box by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the far right side of the desk across from you.
Pick up the cardboard box under the right side of the desk.
Move over to the lamp on the far right side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the right side of the desk.
